data.eml:eml: Two new species of erect Bryozoa (Gymnolaemata: Cheilostomata) and the application of non-destructive imaging methods for quantitative taxonomy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsuyama, Kei, Titschack, Jürgen, Baum, Daniel, Freiwald, André (2015): Two new species of erect Bryozoa (Gymnolaemata: Cheilostomata) and the application of non-destructive imaging methods for quantitative taxonomy. Zootaxa 4020 (1): 81-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4020.1.3
